item.title: Preparation of clean read data for RNA-seq data analysis
item.author: Author
item.description: Summary In this section, we are going to concatenate 4 read files from the same sample into 1 file and perform Fastqc, multiqc, and Trim_galore to check the quality of each read data. 1 1. Concatenation of raw read files First of all, the operating system (OS) I used is Linux Ubuntu 20.04.4. And what I have in my hand are 64 raw read fastq.
